string-array.name: TrickyTronics
string-array.item: Identify components, assemble circuits, test your electronics in this impulsive and hands on event.

string-array.name: lan_gamimg
string-array.item: Hushed voices, silent footsteps, reloading of a gun, reviving of engines, a gush of nitrous .If this is your kind of music, then this is your kind of event! For all those gaming maniacs who can’t get enough of the virtual world! An event promising excitement, pressure, thrill and enjoyment to the core! Where the virtual will merge into reality, the ultimate LAN gaming experience awaits the worthy challengers!

string-array.name: TextoMania
string-array.item: If mozart can play the piano blind, shouldn’t the computer addicts be able to type blindfolded! Lets see…

string-array.name: ClickNCapture
string-array.item: Look at the various events in Technovanza’13 and capture your favourite sectors onto a collage in photoshop. Tickle your creative side, photography, designing ability and your eye for observation altogether with this on spot challenge.

string-array.name: GoogleJunkie
string-array.item: Enough of coding! Come and just Google!! Google Junkie is a fun filled event which checks your capabilities in using the google search engine.

string-array.name: TechQuiz
string-array.item: Passionate about the latest gadgets, well informed about the gods of technological inventions, aware of every bit of the techno world? Explore your technological fascinaton and update your tech knowledge!

string-array.name: tweet2win
string-array.item: Online recharge is lot more fun and perky now, thanks to Technovanza+ Twitter! Its only here that a tweet is equal to Rs 100! Our tasks plus your cool quotient gets you a chance to win a free recharge! So get funky and crazy, amaze us with your talent by completing the wackiest tasks of the season and immediately tweet to win hash tagging Technovanza! Are you game?

string-array.name: TechCharades
string-array.item: Techno is ready to leave you speechless this time (literally)! Forget movies how well can you enact technical words?
